es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command
Class HelpCommand

java.lang.Object
  es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command.Command
      es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command.HelpCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class HelpCommand
extends Command

Represents a Help command from the player that shows the help information of the game.

  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.helpCommand" which default value is "help".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.helpCommand.abbrev" which default value is "info".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.helpCommand.alt" which default value is "about".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "message.helpCommand.help" which default value is "help|info|about".

parser

Constructor Detail

HelpCommand

public HelpCommand(Game game,
                   Parser parser)
Constructs a Help command (as an specific type of Command) that has access to a given game. Being a meta-command, it requires access to the parser of the game engine for getting the help information of other commands. Initially the command is unparsed and unexecuted. Default configuration is assumed at this moment.

Parameters:
game - The game.
parser - The parser.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The arguments 'game' and 'parser' cannot be null.

HelpCommand

public HelpCommand(Game game,
                   Parser parser,
                   java.util.Properties config)
Constructs a Help command (as an specific type of Command) that has access to a given game. Being a meta-command, it requires access to the parser of the game engine for getting the help information of other commands. Initially the command is unparsed and unexecuted. The properties defined in the given configuration override those of the default configuration.

Parameters:
game - The game.
parser - The parser.
config - The configuration.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The arguments 'game', 'parser' and 'config' cannot be null.
